page.title: 02THE M1 MOTORWAY-S.NORMANTON.
page.content: {How The Motorway Changed S.Normanton. One of the main features of our area is the motorway.It was opened in 1968 and has brought many changes. {1.}We were told by Derbyshire County Council that the Growth Zone came to our area because of the M1.A Growth Zone is an area which the Government decides to help by making it easy and cheap for companies to build factories {2.}78 factories have arrived since the motorway opened.There are 5 industrial estates:Wharf Road,Pinxton;Brookhill, Pinxton;Rough Close,S.Normanton; Berristow Lane,S.Normanton;Clover Nook S.Normanton.The biggest industry is engineering.Other main industries include:electrical,plastics,textiles, furniture and transport. {3.}Since the motorway was opened eight housing estates have been built bringing 1507 houses.
